00009 #include "log_lib.h"
00010 
00011 void d_log(const char *logs){
00012         openlog(LOGFILE, LOG_PID|LOG_CONS, LOG_LOCAL0);
00013         syslog(LOG_ALERT,"info: %s\n", logs);
00014         closelog();
00015 }
00016

00026         t = time(NULL);

00038                 fprintf(stderr, "file: "__FILE__", line: %d, " \
